text: Mariyu vastavanga, ad mariyu samud jatala vari (vinasa) visayam (migili poyina) vari nivasa sthalala nundi, miku spastanga telustundi. Vastavaniki, varu (satyanni) grahince varu ayinappatiki, saitan vari karmalanu variki manciviga kanabadetatlu cesadu. A taruvata varini (rju) margam nundi tolagincadu
